name: LittleHeroesArena
description:
*LittleHeroesArena is a game project that we developed as a team for our Computer Engineering major at the  Middle East Technical University.

LittleHeroesArena offers a laidback and casual approach to the auto-battler genre. Offers several unique features and mechanics compared to the traditional auto-battler's.

---------------GAMEPLAY FEATURES--------------

*CHARACTER FUSION*

  • Collecting three copies of the same card not only makes your character stronger as in other auto-battler genre games. In the Little Heroes Arena, your character evolves into a completely different character with different skill sets and stats.

*CLASSES SYSTEM*

  • Collecting characters from the same classes unlock class synergies, making each character stronger. The more characters you acquire from the same class the stronger synergies get. These synergies can be buffs for friendly characters or debuffs for the enemy
